pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, May 30, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, May 30, 2017:

Tuesday, May 30, 2017

Rome, Italy

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the Chamber of Deputies, Her Excellency Laura Boldrini, and the President of the Senate, His Excellency Pietro Grasso.

Palazzo Montecitorio

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver an address.

Sala della Regina
Chamber of Deputies

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

12:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of the Italian Republic, His Excellency Paolo Gentiloni.

Sala Dangolo
Villa Madama

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Prime Minister of the Italian Republic.

Loggia di Raffaelo

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Luncheon with the Prime Minister of the Italian Republic.

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Roundtable with Italian business representatives.

Confindustria

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


Note: all times local
